SELECT area, all_review, today_review FROM ( SELECT CASE WHEN i.state IN ('부산', '울산') THEN '부산울산' WHEN i.state IN ('경기', '인천') THEN '경기인천' ELSE i.state END AS area, COUNT(*) AS all_review, SUM(CASE WHEN TRUNC(r.write_day) = TRUNC(SYSDATE) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS today_review FROM bada_user_review r INNER JOIN bada_info i ON r.beach_code = i.beach_code GROUP BY CASE WHEN i.state IN ('부산', '울산') THEN '부산울산' WHEN i.state IN ('경기', '인천') THEN '경기인천' ELSE i.state END UNION ALL SELECT '전국' AS area, SUM(all_review) AS all_review, SUM(today_review) AS today_review FROM ( SELECT CASE WHEN i.state IN ('부산', '울산') THEN '부산울산' WHEN i.state IN ('경기', '인천') THEN '경기인천' ELSE i.state END AS area, COUNT(*) AS all_review, SUM(CASE WHEN TRUNC(r.write_day) = TRUNC(SYSDATE) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS today_review FROM bada_user_review r INNER JOIN bada_info i ON r.beach_code = i.beach_code GROUP BY CASE WHEN i.state IN ('부산', '울산') THEN '부산울산' WHEN i.state IN ('경기', '인천') THEN '경기인천' ELSE i.state END ) 전국 ) 결과 ORDER BY CASE WHEN area = '전국' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END, area
